Package com.example.freeturilo.connection

Interface ExternalConnection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    APIConnection
    interface ExternalConnection
    An external API connection.

    Object of class implementing this interface performs low-level operations in an I/O connection model.

    This interface should be treated as an adapter. It has been designed to support HTTP/HTTPS connections but could also be used for other types of I/O connections (it is used with FileStreams for testing purposes). For feasibility of understanding the methods will be described as if they were methods used for HTTP/HTTPS connections.

    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Miko≈Çaj Terzyk
    See Also:
    ExternalConnection.Builder, APIConnection, HttpsURLConnection, HttpURLConnection

      static interface  ExternalConnection.Builder
      Builder of external connections.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void disconnect()
      Ends the connection.
      java.io.InputStream getInputStream()
      Gets the input stream of this connection which can be later used to retrieve an object from the response of this connection.
      java.io.OutputStream getOutputStream()
      Gets the output stream of this connection which can be later used to attach an object to the request of this connection.
      int getResponseCode()
      Gets the response code from the response of this connection.
      void setChunkedStreamingMode​(int chunkLength)
      Sets length of a chunk in chunked streaming mode.
      void setDoOutput​(boolean doOutput)
      Sets a flag that indicates whether an object is attached to the request of this connection.
      void setRequestProperty​(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Sets a request property.

    • Method Detail

      • setRequestProperty

        void setRequestProperty​(java.lang.String key,
                        java.lang.String value)
        Sets a request property.
        Parameters:
        key - a string equal to property name
        value - a string equal to property value

      • setDoOutput

        void setDoOutput​(boolean doOutput)
        Sets a flag that indicates whether an object is attached to the request of this connection.
        Parameters:
        doOutput - a boolean defining whether an object is or will be attached to this connection's request

      • setChunkedStreamingMode

        void setChunkedStreamingMode​(int chunkLength)
        Sets length of a chunk in chunked streaming mode.
        Parameters:
        chunkLength - an integer equal to the length of a chunk in chunked streaming mode

      • getOutputStream

        java.io.OutputStream getOutputStream()
                              throws APIException
        Gets the output stream of this connection which can be later used to attach an object to the request of this connection.
        Returns:
        a writeable output stream
        Throws:
        APIException - an exception representing an error which occurred when trying to retrieve the output stream

      • getInputStream

        java.io.InputStream getInputStream()
                            throws APIException
        Gets the input stream of this connection which can be later used to retrieve an object from the response of this connection.
        Returns:
        a readable input stream
        Throws:
        APIException - an exception representing an error which occurred when trying to retrieve the input stream

      • getResponseCode

        int getResponseCode()
             throws APIException
        Gets the response code from the response of this connection.
        Returns:
        an integer equal to the response code of this connection's response
        Throws:
        APIException - an exception representing an error which occurred when trying to retrieve the response code

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
        Ends the connection.
